Flying
This creature can't block
Whenever a land card is put into a graveyard from anywhere, this creature deals 1 damage to each opponent.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, create X 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens, where X is the number of land cards in your graveyard. Those tokens gain haste until end of turn. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step.

First strike
Whenever Ignos deals combat damage to a player, discard up to three cards, then draw that many cards. When you discard one or more cards this way, target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each card discarded this way.

Pyroclastic Pulse deals X damage to each creature and planeswalker your opponents control, where X is the number of land cards in your graveyard.

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a land card is put into a graveyard from anywhere, put a loam counter on this enchantment.
{2}{G}, Remove X loam counters from this enchantment and sacrifice it: Destroy X target artifacts and/or enchantments.

Vigilance, reach, trample
[i]Landfall[/i] — Whenever a land you control enters, you may sacrifice it. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, draw a card, and add one mana of any color that land could produce.

Delve [i](Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)[/i]
Creatures you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. Until your next end step, you may play lands card exiled with this spell.

Vigilance, reach
Each creature your opponents control with power equal to or less than the number of land cards in your graveyard is goaded.
{3}, Sacrifice a land or discard a land card: Draw a card.

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each land card in your graveyard.
Whenever Tiz'Ek attacks, surveil 3.
You may cast sorcery spells from your graveyard by exiling two land cards from your graveyard in addition to paying their other costs.

cards.rules_text:
Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Create a Treasure token.
• Create a 3/2 colorless Vehicle artifact token with crew 1.
• Discard up to three cards, then draw that many cards.
• Choose a Vehicle you control. It becomes an artifact creature and gains haste until end of turn.

Whenever this Vehicle attacks, you may sacrifice a creature that crewed it this turn. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature or Vehicle card. Put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
Crew 3 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
When this creature enters, choose any number of target artifact tokens you control with different names. For each of those targets, create a token that's a copy of it.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Gimme one look and your replacement parts will be ready in no time.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Vehicles you control have vigilance and menace.
{T}, Sacrifice another artifact or creature: Create a 1/1 white Sailor artifact creature token with “This token crews Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater.” If that permanent was legendary or a Vehicle, create two of those tokens instead.
Crew 3

Vehicles you control have myriad. Tokens created this way are artifact creatures and aren't legendary. [i](Whenever a Vehicle with myriad attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of that Vehicle that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile those tokens at end of combat.)[/i]

If one or more artifact tokens would be created under your control, those tokens plus that many Junk tokens are created instead. [i](They're artifacts with “{T}, Sacrifice this token: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{3}, {T}, Exile Gastrolith Engine: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a Swamp card and a Mountain card, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Suspend 3—{1}{W} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{W} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]

Ward {1} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.)[/i]
Commanders you control have ward {1}.
Whenever a ward cost of a permanent you control is paid, draw a card.

Overload {X}{U} [i](You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change “target” in its text to “each.”)[/i]
Target player draws X cards.

At the beginning of your first upkeep each turn, you get an additional upkeep step after this step.
At the beginning of your first end step each turn, you get an additional end step after this step.
Partner [i](You can have two commanders if both have partner.)[/i]

Reach
Whenever this creature becomes tapped, you gain 3 life.
{2}{G}, {T}: Exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard. Create a Treasure token.

Whenever a player attacks, if there are no creatures attacking you or a permanent you control, that player may put a land card from their hand onto the battlefield. If an opponent put a land card onto the battlefield this way, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

At the beginning of your end step, untap each nonland permanent you control.
Whenever an opponent casts their first noncreature spell each turn, you may embrace. If you do, draw a card. [i](To embrace, tap two artifacts and/or creatures you control.)[/i]

This spell can't be countered.
Draw four cards, then you gain life equal to the number of cards in your hand.
You may cast a spell with mana value 5 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost. That spell can't be countered.

At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each tapped creature you control.
{G}{W}, Embrace: You gain 3 life. [i](To embrace, tap two artifacts and/or creatures you control.)[/i]

During your turn, Tursi has hexproof and indestructible.
Whenever Tursi attacks, you and defending player each draw cards equal to its power, then gain life equal to its toughness.

{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a Plains card and an Island card, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.

Changeling [i](This card is every creature type.)[/i]
Evolve [i](Whenever a creature you control enters, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
At the beginning of combat on your turn, this creature becomes a copy of up to one other target creature until end of turn, except it's a 0/2 and has changeling and evolve.

If an ability of a Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent source you control would trigger, it triggers an additional time. If this creature is mature, that ability triggers two additional times instead.

Whenever you cast a permanent spell with mana value 5 or greater, each opponent discards a card. Each opponent who didn't discard a nonland card this way loses 3 life.
{T}, Sacrifice another creature: You lose 1 life and draw a card. If that creature had mana value 5 or greater, you lose 3 life and draw three cards instead.
Partner [i](You can have two commanders if both have partner.)[/i]

Impending 4—{1}{B}, Pay 4 life [i](If you cast this spell for its impending cost, it enters with four time counters and isn't a creature until the last is removed. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter from it.)[/i]
Flying, menace
At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses 1 life and you surveil 1.

{T}: Add {G}.

Trample
When this creature enters, it explores X times, where X is the number of other permanents you control with power, toughness, or mana value 4 or higher. [i](To explore, reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

Deathtouch
Whenever a Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, Serpent, or Whale you control enters, surveil 2 and you gain 2 life.
{1}, {T}: Add {B}{G}{U}. Spend this mana only to cast spells with mana value 4 or greater or activate abilities of sources with mana value 4 or greater.
When Deil enters, you may cast a spell from your hand with mana value less than Deil's power without paying its mana cost.

Choose one —
• Each opponent sacrifices an artifact of their choice.
• Each opponent sacrifices a creature of their choice.
• Each opponent sacrifices an enchantment of their choice.
Entwine— Sacrifice two permanents [i](Choose all if you pay the entwine cost.)[/i]

Kizahn can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
When Kizahn enters, mill seven cards, then put each card with mana value 5 or greater milled this way into your hand.

• Destroy all artifacts and creatures.
• Return target historic permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It enters with two additional +1/+1 counters on it if it's a creature. [i](Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)[/i]
